titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union, Local 340A of New York Arbitration Cases WAG.293

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-07-17T15:20-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union, Local 340A of New York Arbitration Cases

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Materials relate to the Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union Local 340A of New York, and arbitration cases such as Local 1125 v. Kelly Mutual Credit Clothing Company.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union, Local 340A of New York Arbitration Cases; WAG 293; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Copyright is assumed to be held by the original creator of individual items in the collection; these items are expected to pass into the public domain 120 years after their creation. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Tamiment Libary received a gift the Retail Apparel Salespeople's Union, Local 304A arbitration files. The date and provenance of this donation is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.224.
